msbt.message: It's fun to see how someone's personality is revealed in their furniture choice and arrangement It leads to some verrrry fascinating discoveries, don't you think?I mean, just look at this place! It says so much about you, . It really does.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I hope your bed is as comfortable as it looks, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When it comes to selecting a bed, there are just so many things to consider! Is it soft enough? Is it firm enough? What is it made of? How long will it last? Is it the right size? If only picking the right bed was as easy as picking out the right pillow covers, .

I find watching television so relaxing. That is, unless I'm watching one of those terribly intense dramas. I get so wrapped up in what's happening to the characters It's as if I'm living out the drama myself! It's quite stressful, you know. But all I have to do is turn on a shopping program and my nerves are calmed.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is a very nice one, isn't it?I don't know much about these things, but I can tell just by looking at it that you have good taste. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Audio equipment is always a stylish way to pull a room together. So, bravo, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My dear, I'm pleased to see that you have a clock in this room. It's so nice to know that it's right now. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yes, yes, island life is supposed to be laid-back and whatnot But the passage of time is important! I just wish more people took it as seriously as you clearly do, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh my, so you're raising ! Lovely! Tending to plants is commendable.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />They need plenty of water and sun. But did you know that plants also benefit from good conversation? It's true, ! Now, don't be embarrassed. Just go ahead and chat with it like you would a friend.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is sparkling clean—not a single streak or spot to be seen! It's almost as if you never use it,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is the centerpiece of your layout, is it?There's just something about it I can see why you'd want to show it off, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't help but wonder about the here.Did you choose it based on its look or based on how comfortable it is?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And do you choose friends based on their appearance?! Or based on what's inside?! Oh dear! I don't know what got into me! I'm so sorry I overreacted, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! YOU play the ?! Why, that's music to my ears! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />I confess, I have a fondness for those who can play an instrument. It is such an admirable skill. Well, I can't help but look at you differently now, .
Your is quite lovely. You certainly have excellent taste. The culinary arts are an admirable pursuit. I only wish I had more time to spend in the kitchen.

Are you the sporting type? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You must be, since you have your own . Maybe I should take a page from your book and take up a sport. Let's see. Perhaps! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No. No. Too much sweating. Perspiration is not one of my strong suits, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />... Inside your home? How very unusual and -esque. It does add a clever accent to the room's decor. Yes, I think it's simply wonderful, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The way you selected that spot for your it spotlights your skills as a designer! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love how it casually, yet powerfully ties this fabulous room together, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, eh? Why, I bet this is where you go to get your look put together. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I must ask About how many hours each morning does it take you to get ready? How many hours does it take me?! Why, I couldn't possibly keep count, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The fact that you have here is just so very YOU, darling! <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />You know, I've noticed how you always pay careful attention to your fashion choices. And I wouldn't say this to just anyone, but this whole look of yoursI approve, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why, what anunusualchoice for a roommate, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But you two do seem snug as a, um, bug in a rug, .

<20_2 arg="10" />My goodness,<20_2 arg="9" /> but have you noticed somethingfishyabout your roommate here, ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hee-hee, I'm terribly sorry—I simply couldn't help myself, .Your is wonderful. Do take good care of it, my dear.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My, my, ! What a bold decor choice! I mean,
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not everyone could pull it off. But, darling, this "paleontologist chic" thing is really working for you.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why, I see that you've put a piece of fine art on display in your home, . <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I can't say I'm surprised. I always suspected that you and I share a sophisticated sensibility.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My goodness, ! What an interesting place to put . <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />It's impressive but, I imagine, also very heavy. What will you do when you need to move it?! You know, darling, I'd love to be of help when that time comes, but I suspect I'll beehquite busy.

<20_2 arg="10" />The <20_2 arg="9" /> you have here, It is, how do I put thisa wee bit different from how I remember it.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But really, darling, I couldn't give a flying figure drawing. If YOU like it, that is ALL that matters.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What a wise addition to the room! I tell you, you can't go wrong with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Good air circulation is so very important, you see. Even homes need to breathe, .

<20_2 arg="10" />You'd think<20_2 arg="9" /> it would be difficult to understand a creature such as this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But all you need to do is use your intuition, darling. Just close your eyesand feel what it is feeling You see, ! It is as happy as can be, obviously.
